name: curriculum-vitae
description: Membuat curriculum vitae dari sisi back end

scripts.dev-resync: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev-resync && npx sequelize-cli db:drop --env development --config ./src/config/config.json && npx sequelize-cli db:create --env development --config ./src/config/config.json && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env development --config ./src/config/config.json && nodemon server.js
scripts.db:migrate: npx sequelize-cli migration:generate --name create-user && npx sequelize-cli migration:generate --name create-refreshToken && npx sequelize-cli migration:generate --name create-account && npx sequelize-cli migration:generate --name create-certificate && npx sequelize-cli migration:generate --name create-education && npx sequelize-cli migration:generate --name create-intership && npx sequelize-cli migration:generate --name create-portofolio && npx sequelize-cli migration:generate --name create-project && npx sequelize-cli migration:generate --name create-skill
scripts.test-resync: cross-env NODE_ENV=test-resync && npx sequelize-cli db:drop --env test --config ./src/config/config.json && npx sequelize-cli db:create --env test --config ./src/config/config.json && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env test --config ./src/config/config.json && jest --testTimeout=10000

author: Arif Fajar Pangestu
